parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Loose rear wheel spokes can cause the motorcycle to wobble or vibrate, leading to a loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The motorcycle wobbles or vibrates
especially during deceleration or braking
the rear wheel shakes or wobbles
the motorcycle becomes difficult to control
the rider experiences a loss of traction or stability.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Loose Spokes on Rear Wheel Rim
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Loose spokes on the rear wheel rim can cause the tire to travel at a different axis than the hub, leading to an unstable condition, loss of control, and potentially accidents.
symptoms: The motorcycle develops an unstable condition
feeling similar to riding on an under-inflated rear tire
excessive wobbling of the front wheel
loss of control
compromised steering
and difficulty handling the motorcycle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS unit can cause the rear brakes to stop working while in motion, leading to a loss of control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The rear brake pedal becomes rock solid and will not depress
the rear brakes fail to engage
the brake fluid level is normal
but the brakes do not function properly.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: ABS System Failure leading to Rear Brake Lockup
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS system can cause the rear brake to engage and not release, leading to a loss of control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The rear brake pedal becomes rock solid and will not depress
the rear brakes fail to engage
the brake fluid level is normal
but the brakes do not function properly
the rear brake engages and does not release.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Lack of Maintenance Requirements for ABS System
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lack of maintenance requirements for the ABS system can lead to unexpected failures, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The ABS system fails without warning
the rear brakes fail to engage
the brake fluid level is normal
but the brakes do not function properly.
